did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Three letters written to Merril Freeman.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Buffalo Bill letters (AZ 008). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: American scout and showman. William Frederick Cody, known as Buffalo Bill, operated Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show and other business enterprises from 1883 on.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Three letters to Merrill P. Freeman, dated March 6, 1912, March 12, 1914, and July 10, 1914. Cody (Buffalo Bill) is responding to items Freeman has written and sent to him.
